mapper.update: update task set job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schedule_rate = #{scheduleRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, schedule_unit = #{scheduleUnit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, scheduled_count = #{scheduledCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select 'false' as QUERYID,task_id, job_id, name, description, schedule_rate, schedule_unit, scheduled_count, status, create_time, update_time from task where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select task_id, job_id, name, description, schedule_rate, schedule_unit, scheduled_count, status, create_time, update_time from task
